pitch.@cc: Mark Buehrle has thrown 84 pitches but has plenty left in the tank, with his fastball sitting at 85 over the past 10 pitches.
Mark Buehrle is trying to tie up Ty Wigginton with fastballs inside; Wigginton is hitting .343 on pitches in that location compared to .263 overall.
